entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
